messages.message:
Hi team,

NWM flagged behavior with the Human-in-the-Loop (HIL) interface in AI Hub:
• For HIL jobs triggered through an App, the “Submit and Continue” button  unavailable.
• For the same pipeline triggered via a Deployment, the button works as expected.
Is this the intended behavior? If not - what could be the cause of the Submit + Continue not being available in an app run

Human review configuration (SLAs, review queues, etc) is only available for deployment runs, so this is expected. App runs will also not appear in the Reviews tab of a workspace, even if validations fail.
